message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. It's a fantastic opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm really interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
I understand that $120 is a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $100. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $100 is still a bit too high for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $85.
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I can offer it to you for $95. It's the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I think it's still a great deal.

I really appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $95 is still a bit too high for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I'm trying to stick to my budget.

I understand that you're trying to stick to your budget, Bob. However, I've already compromised a lot, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to meet you at $92, but that's as low as I can go.
